text: Jeremiah Briscoe (born August 15, 1993) is an American football quarterback who is currently a member of the Edmonton Eskimos. He played college football at Sam Houston State. ==College career== Briscoe started his college career at the University of Alabama at Birmingham (UAB) in 2014 and transferred to Sam Houston State University after UAB's football program was cut. As a junior in the 2016 season, Briscoe won the Walter Payton Award after passing for 4,602 yards and 57 touchdowns. As a senior in 2017, Briscoe repeated as the Payton Award winner. He is only the 2nd player in FCS history to repeat. ==References== ==External links== *Sam Houston State Bearkats bio *UAB Blazers bio Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:Players of American football from Texas Category:American football quarterbacks Category:UAB Blazers football players Category:Sam Houston State Bearkats football players Category:Walter Payton Award winners Category:Edmonton Eskimos players Category:Canadian football quarterbacks
title: Jeremiah Briscoe
